resources.string: We\’ll email you instructions to reset your password.
Now let\'s create a new password.
You must confirm your email account before continuing.
We\'ve emailed you instructions for signing in.
This email/password combination is invalid. Please try again.
Log in with your Ninja account to start.
Do you know that you can use your Shark|Ninja account to log in?
Didn\'t get the email? Check your spam folder. If the message still hasn\'t arrived after a few minutes, tap the button below and we will re-send it.
We sent you an email with instructions on how to reset your password. Open the email and tap the Reset Password link to get started.
Let\'s create your new Ninja account.
I agree to the Terms & Conditions
I have read and understand the Privacy Notice
We sent an email to %1$s. Open the email and tap Verify to proceed.
We just resent the email! Check your email to confirm your account.
Verifying... please hold on a few seconds.
Add Rich, fully developed smokiness to any dish you make flavored by pellets.
Our Ninja culinary team has developed cooking charts that will guide you toward a successful cook.

Please go to your mobile settings to grant access. 
1. Open your mobile device's settings 
2. Select Privacy 
3. Select Local Network 
4. Look for the Ninja Kitchen app and 
toggle on to grant permission 
5. Return to the Ninja Kitchen app
Reset your Grill: Turn off your Grill presing the button
Reactivate Discoverable mode: Hold for tree seconds the mode button on the Grill.
Forgot password: Try checking the back of your router or contact someone who may know it.
Server Issue: Make sure your network is not a VPN or proxy server.
Other: If you\'re having internet issues with other products in your home, contact your internet service provider.
Try checking the back of your router or contact someone who may know it.
Make sure your network is not a VPN or proxy server.
If you\'re having internet issues with other products in your home, contact your internet service provider.
Get in touch with us by calling 1-855-427-5123
Unplug the power cord from the wall (or the back of the router), wait 60 seconds, then plug it back in.

Ninja Grills only connect to 2.4GHz networks. Make sure your 2.4GHz network is not hidden or turned off. If you have an app for your router, use it to unhide or turn on your 2.4GHz network. Alternatively, contact your internet service provider.
If you’re having internet issues with other products in your home, contact your internet service provider.
Data Protection, Terms of Use, Privacy Policy…
Your appliance, Weight unit, Temperature unit…
Are you sure you want to log out?

SharkNinja (“us” or “we”) collects personal information (e.g. email address and connected IP address) about you when you use this Ninja Pro Connect App. We use your personal information to administer your account and to provide connected appliance related products and services you have requested from us. We may share the information collected with our affiliates and service providers.

When you successfully login, the Ninja Pro Connect App will generate an authorization token which is stored locally on your phone and is refreshed every time you use the Ninja Pro Connect App. This token is only used to keep you logged into the app.For more details on how we use the collected information, please see:
Deleting your account permanently removes all account information including appliance connections.\n\nYou will need to create a new account during your next log in attempt.
Are you sure you want to delete your account?
This cannot be undone and may take a moment to work.
Your account has been deleted! Hope to see you soon!
Now let’s create a new password.
The save attempt has failed. Try again?
Ninja Woodfire™ ProConnect XL Outdoor Grill & Smoker
It looks like there\'s no paired appliance yet. To start monitoring your cooking sessions from your device, add an appliance below.
Are you sure you want to delete your appliance?
You will restore factory settings, are you sure?
You will restore factory settings, are you sure?
This cannot be undone and may take a moment to work.
Please allow permissions\nto connect to your Grill.
Tap “OK” or “Allow” to accept the permission prompts. These prompts must be accepted for the app to connect to your Grill.
Turn on Bluetooth for this device.
Allow to find and determine the relative\nposition of nearby devices
Allow access to your location while you are\nusing the app
Plug unit in to proper 3-prong GFCI\noutlets only.
Turn on your Grill presing the button\nfor 3 seconds.
• Press and hold the dial for 3-5 seconds until you hear an audible beep.\n\n• Press NEXT button below to select your Grill.
Oops! It seems like you have disabled bluetooth.
You can find it in the settings section of your mobile phone.
Whoops, you declined to allow to know the position of nearby devices!
When prompted, allow your mobile device to connect to your bluetooth to be able to control and monitor your Grill.
Whoops, you declined to allow location permission!
When prompted, allow your mobile device to connect your location to be able to detect your Grill easily.
Great! We are going to be good friends!
All set! We are going to be good friends!
Oops, looks like there has been an incident while connecting.
Please try to connect to your grill again.
Whoops... There was a problem finding your Grill. Please try again!
Press and hold the dial for 3-5 seconds on the Grill, to activate the discovery mode. You have successfully paired when the Bluetooth icon has transitioned from flashing to solid white.
Do you want to pick a cool name for me?
All changes will be lost. Are you sure you want to discard them?
Do you want to help chef?
Our culinary team has developed cooking charts to guide you how to set your cook session successfully.
For this cook mode, you need to add the grill plate and the grease tray. Please confirm your grill is safe to begin Heating.
For this cook mode, you need to add all accessories. Please confirm your grill is safe to begin Heating.

Insert the Built-In Thermometer
 into the thickest part of your
 protein while the grill is
 preheating.
Insert the Built-In Thermometer into the\nthickest part of your protein while the\ngrill is preheating.
You are about to change the cooking control type, you will have to add new settings. The grill will no longer operate on a timed setting.
Want to change to Timed Cook?
Your cook will complete when the timer runs out, rather than when your thermometers meet their target temperatures. You will lose your thermometer settings.
At least one thermometer must be\nplugged into the grill to use\nthermometer mode.
Your first thermometer must be plugged in to track its readings.
Your second thermometer must be plugged in to track its readings.
Verifying..., please hold on a few seconds.
You will receive real-time notifications about the status of your grill and cook.
I don\'t want to be notified.
Dehydrate and Broil cooking modes do not support thermometer cooking. Try changing the cook mode if you’d like to monitor thermometers.
Dehydrate and Reheat cooking modes do not support thermometer cooking. Try changing the cook mode if you’d like to monitor thermometers.
Pairing is required to access the app. Canceling the process will log you out.
You will have to start the process over again if you’d like to pair a new appliance.
By pairing with WiFi, you can control your Grill anywhere, so long as there\'s an internet connection.
Thermometer %1$s: We’ve reached your set resting temperature.
What are you thinking to %1$s today?
You need to allow this app to send push notifications to use this feature.
Select as many as you would like.
What are you thinking to\nGrill today?
Choose the type of food available in\ncook mode selected.
Choose your Grill to start the setup\nprocess.
This may take a few minutes
Please, keep this screen open and live until the connection has completed.
Looks like I wasn\'t able to connect. Let\'s try something else!
Turn off your Grill by pressing the button.
2. Cycle the Wi-Fi on your mobile device.
Turn off Wi-Fi on your mobile device. Wait 10 seconds, then turn it back on and connect to your network.
Hmm... something is still not working. Don\'t worry! Here are some other things you can try.
Press the power button\nto turn your Grill on.
My network doesn\'t require a password
Make sure the network has at least 2 bars. If the signal is too weak, try moving your Grill closer to the router.
Add rich, fully developed smokiness to any dish.
When filtering by this option, the following cook mode will not be available: Broil
Your grill is preheated and ready to go
The cook will not continue until the lid is closed.
Your grill will stay warm for up to 5 minutes.
Thermometer 1: Remove from the grill and allow it to rest. It will continue to cook with residual heat to reach the set temperature.
Thermometer 2: Remove from the grill and allow it to rest. It will continue to cook with residual heat to reach the set temperature.
25ft max length, no less than 14\ngauge OR 50 ft, no less than 12\ngauge.
If you require an extension cord it must be:
Plug unit in to proper 3-\nprong GFCI outlets only
Press the rounded Start/Stop button until the screen lights up.
Plug unit in to proper\n3-prong GFCI outlets only.
Your account is not verified yet. Please check your spam folder.
Press the Start button on your Grill
Press the rounded Start/Stop button until\nthe screen lights up
Connect the app to your Grill
Activate discovery mode on the Grill.
Please hold the mode button on the Grill for three seconds to activate discovery mode.
Let\'s try with Wi-Fi, you’ll be able to\ncontrol your cook from anywhere as long\nas internet connection is available.
Whoops, you declined to join the appliance network!
When prompted, allow your mobile device to connect to Appliance name\'s Wi-Fi network.
After rebooting, hold for tree seconds the mode button on the Grill until you\'re prompted, and the Wi-Fi indicator begins to flash.
Looks like I wasn\'t able to connect. Let\'s try a simple solution.
Unplug the power cord from the wall (or the back of the router), wait 60 seconds, then plug it back in.
Whoops! You declined permission for Ninja Kitchen to access your local area network.
We are connected to your Grill, now let\'s pair to Wi-Fi
Let\'s give your Ninja Grill a name
Give your Ninja appliance a name.
You will need to accept the permission prompts so the app can connect to your Grill.
Select OK / Join to accept the permission prompts. These prompts must be accepted for the app to connect to the Grill.
If you select Don\'t Allow / Cancel, the app will not be able to access your Grill!
Follow the suggestions below to ensure a successful cooking experience.
Times listed in these charts are based on the quantities defined. Please adjust time based on your own quantity of food.
Plug in the RCD. Once Plugged in, the light below the RESET button should be lit. If the light is not on, please try a different socket.
Press the TEST button on the RCD. The light should turn off. Now press the RESET button, and light should reappear. You can now turn on your grill.
Flip the power switch to the ON (|) position. This switch is located behind the control panel.
The RCD must be plugged\ninto a compatible outlet.
Flip the power switch to the ON position.
The grill screen should light up.
Press and hold the dial for 3-5 seconds until you hear an audible beep. A Bluetooth icon will also begin to blink on the display.
Tell us how we are doing.
Sorry you’re having trouble, would you like to visit the support section?

NINJA COOKING CONNECTED GRILL
IMPORTANT: PLEASE READ THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THIS LICENSE AGREEMENT CAREFULLY BEFORE CONTINUING WITH THIS PROGRAM INSTALL OR USE OF THIS PRODUCT:

SharkNinja Operating LLC’s (“SharkNinja”) End-User License Agreement (“EULA”) is a legal agreement between You (either a single entity or an individual) and SharkNinja for SharkNinja’s Software Applications, including those installed by You onto your SharkNinja products or already installed on your device, including all firmware (referred hereafter as “SN APPS”). By installing, copying, checking a box, clicking a button confirming your agreement to these terms, or otherwise continuing to use the SN APPS, You agree to be bound by the terms of this EULA. This license agreement represents the entire agreement concerning SN APPS between You and SharkNinja, and it supersedes any prior proposal, representation, or understanding between the parties. If You do not agree to the terms of this EULA, do not install or use the SN APPS or this product. The SN APPS are protected by copyright laws and international copyright treaties, as well as other intellectual property laws and treaties.

1. GRANT OF LICENSE. The SN APPS are licensed as follows:
1.1 Installation and Use. SharkNinja grants You the right to download, install, and use SN APPS on the specified platform for which the SN APP was designed and in connection with SharkNinja products with which the SN APPS are designed to operate (“SN Devices”).
1.2 Backup Copies. You may also make a copy of SN APPS downloaded and installed by You for backup and archival purposes.

2. DESCRIPTION OF OTHER RIGHTS AND LIMITATIONS.
2.1 Maintenance of Copyright Notices. You must not remove or alter any copyright notices on any and all copies of the SN APPS.
2.2 Distribution. You may not distribute copies of the SN APPS to third parties.
2.3 Prohibition on Reverse Engineering, Decompilation, and Disassembly. You may not reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble SN APPS, except and only to the extent that such activity is expressly permitted by applicable law notwithstanding this limitation. SharkNinja strictly prohibits reverse engineering SN APPS or devices or taking any other action designed to manipulate the functionality of a connected device.2.4 Rental. You may not rent, lease, or lend SN APPS without written permission from SharkNinja.
2.5 NOT FOR RESALE SOFTWARE. Applications identified as “Not for Resale” or “NFR,” may not be resold, transferred, or used for any purpose other than demonstration, test, or evaluation.
2.6 Support Services. SharkNinja may provide You with support services related to SN APPS (“Support Services”). Any supplemental software code provided to You as part of the Support Services shall be considered part of SN APPS and subject to the terms and conditions of this EULA.
2.7 Compliance with Applicable Laws. You must comply with all applicable laws regarding use of SN APPS.
3. UPDATES. SharkNinja may provide You with upgrades or updates to SN APPS. This EULA will govern any upgrades provided by SharkNinja that replace and/or supplement SN APPS, unless such upgrade is accompanied by a separate EULA, in which case the terms of that EULA will govern. If You decide not to download and use an upgrade or update provided by SharkNinja, You understand that You could put SN Apps at risk to serious security threats or cause SN Apps to become unusable or unstable.
4. DATA AND PRIVACY. SharkNinja is committed to ensuring your privacy by adhering to high standards of fairness and integrity. We are committed to keeping our customers informed about how we use the information we gather from You through the use of each of our websites or SN APPS. Our privacy practices are described in SharkNinja’s Privacy Policy, as well as in separate notices given when an app, product, or service is purchased or downloaded. By using SN APPs or providing us with your personal information, You are accepting and consenting to the practices, terms, and conditions described in SharkNinja’s Privacy Policy. At all times your information will be treated in accordance with the SharkNinja Privacy Policy, which is incorporated by reference into this EULA and can be viewed at the following URL:http://www.sharkninja.com/privacy.
5. THIRD-PARTY APPLICATION LIBRARIES AND EMBEDDED SOFTWARE.
5.1 You acknowledge that Ayla Networks, Inc. (“Ayla”) has provided certain application libraries that have been embedded into SN APPS (“Ayla Application Libraries”) and enables SN Devices to connect to the Ayla Cloud Service (“Ayla Embedded Software”).5.2 You will not use the Ayla Application Libraries except as an incorporated portion of SN APPS,unmodified from the form provided to You.
5.3 You will not use the Ayla Embedded Software except as an incorporated portion of SN Devices, unmodified from the form provided to You.
5.4 You will not modify, adapt, translate, or create derivative works based on, or decompile, disassemble, reverse engineer, or otherwise attempt to derive the source code or underlying algorithms of, the Ayla Application Libraries or the Ayla Embedded Software.
5.5 SharkNinja retains all ownership of SN APPS (and the Ayla Application Libraries contained therein) and any software installed on SN Devices (including the Ayla Embedded Software) and only a license thereto is granted to You for use in connection with the SN APPS and SN Devices.
5.6 You will not use the Ayla Application Libraries or Ayla Embedded Software to attempt to gain unauthorized access to or use of the systems/services of SharkNinja’s other licensors; nor will You transmit viruses, worms, Trojan horses, time bombs, spyware, malware, cancelbots, passive collection mechanisms, robots, data mining software, or any other malicious or invasive code or program into the systems/services of SharkNinja’s other licensors.
5.7 You will not use the Ayla Application Libraries or Ayla Embedded Software to interfere with, breach, or circumvent any security feature, authentication feature, or any other feature that restricts or enforces limitations on the use of, or access to, the systems/services of SharkNinja’s other licensors.
5.8 You will not probe, attack, scan, or test the vulnerability of the systems/services of SharkNinja’s other licensors.
5.9 SharkNinja’s other licensors of the SN APPS, Ayla Application Libraries, and the Ayla Embedded Software are the express third-party beneficiaries of this EULA, and the provisions of this Section of this EULA are made expressly for the benefit of such licensors, and are enforceable by such licensors.
6. TERMINATION. Without prejudice to any other rights, SharkNinja may terminate this EULA if You fail to comply with the terms and conditions of this EULA. In such event, You must destroy all copies of SN APPS in your possession.
7. COPYRIGHT. All title, including but not limited to copyrights, in and to SN APPS and any copies thereof are owned by SharkNinja or its suppliers. All title and intellectual property rights in and to the content which may be accessed through use of SN APPS are the property of the respective content owner and may be protected by applicable copyright or other intellectual property laws and treaties. This EULA grants You no rights to use such content. All rights not expressly granted are reserved by SharkNinja.
8. OPEN SOURCE SOFTWARE. You hereby acknowledge that SN APPS may contain software that is subject to “open source” or “free software” licenses (“Open Source Software”). The license granted by this EULA does not apply to Open Source Software contained in the SN APPS. Rather, the terms and conditions in the applicable Open Source Software license shall apply to the Open Source Software. Nothing in this EULA limits your rights under, or grants You rights that supersede, any Open Source Software license. You acknowledge that the Open Source Software license is solely between You and the applicable licensor of the Open Source Software. To the extent the terms of the licenses applicable to the Open Source Softwarerequire SharkNinja to provide the Open Source Software, in either source or executable form, or to provide copies of applicable license terms or other required information, You may obtain a copy of the software by contacting SharkNinja at the below physical address. Additional information about the Open Source Software, and its terms of use, may be found at www.sharkninja.com/privacy.
9. NO WARRANTIES. SharkNinja expressly disclaims any warranty for SN APPS, Ayla Application Libraries, or Ayla Embedded Software. SN APPS, Ayla Application Libraries, and Ayla Embedded Software are provided ‘As Is’ without any express or implied warranty of any kind, including but not limited to any warranties of merchantability, noninfringement, fitness of a particular purpose, or title. SharkNinja does not warrant or assume responsibility for the accuracy or completeness of any information, text, graphics, links, or other items contained within the SN APPS. SharkNinja makes no warranties respecting any harm that may be caused by the transmission of a computer virus, worm, logic bomb, or other such computerprogram. SharkNinja further expressly disclaims any warranty or representation to any third party.
10. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY. In no event shall SharkNinja or its suppliers be liable for any special, incidental, punitive, indirect, or consequential damages whatsoever (including, but not limited to, damages for loss of profits or confidential or other information, for business interruption, for personal injury, for loss of privacy, for failure to meet any duty including of good faith or of reasonable care, for negligence, and for any other pecuniary or other loss whatsoever) arising out of or in any way related to the use of or inability to use SN Devices or SN APPS, the provision of or failure to provide support or other services, information, software, and related content through the product or otherwise arising out of the use of SN APPS, or otherwise under or in connection with any provision of this EULA, even in the event of the fault, tort (including negligence), strict liability, breach of contract, or breach of warranty of SharkNinja or any supplier, and even if SharkNinja or any supplier has been advised of the possibility of such damages. SharkNinja shall have no liability with respect to the content of the SN APPS or any part thereof, including but not limited to errors or omissions contained therein, libel, infringements of rights of publicity, privacy, trademark rights, business interruption, personal injury, loss of privacy, moral rights, or the disclosure of confidential information.
11. APPLICABLE LAW. The laws of the Commonwealth of Massachusetts will govern this EULA and You hereby consent to exclusive jurisdiction and venue in the state and federal courts sitting in the Commonwealth of Massachusetts.
12. ASSIGNMENT. SharkNinja may assign this EULA without notice to Licensor.
13. ENTIRE AGREEMENT. This EULA (including any addendum or amendment to this EULA which is included with the SN Devices) is the entire agreement between You and SharkNinja relating to the SN APPS and supersedes all prior or contemporaneous oral or written communications, proposals and representations with respect to the SN APPS or any other subject matter covered by this EULA. To the extent the terms of any SharkNinja policies or programs for support services conflict with the terms of this EULA, the terms of this EULA shall control. If You have questions regarding this EULA, please contact SharkNinja at 89 A Street, Suite 100, Needham, MA 02494.

DATA AND PRIVACY. SharkNinja is committed to ensuring your privacy by adhering to high standards of fairness and integrity. We are committed to keeping our customers informed about how we use the information we gather from You through the use of each of our websites or SN APPS. Our privacy practices are described in SharkNinja’s Privacy Policy, as well as in separate notices given when an app, product, or service is purchased or downloaded. By using SN APPs or providing us with your personal information, You are accepting and consenting to the practices, terms, and conditions described in SharkNinja’s Privacy Policy. Flip the power switch to the ON (I) position. This switch is located on the back of the unit.\n\nNext, press the power button on the front panel.
Your appliance has lost its Wi-Fi connection. Ensure you have Wi-Fi turned on and that the appliance is within range.
